hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Poe Bottle#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Compass Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Treasure Box Shop#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Poe Bottle#.

hinted_locations: Jabu Jabus Belly MQ Boomerang Room Small Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Bomb Flower Platform Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a spider behind a #gate in the Water Temple# holds #the Kokiri Sword#.

Bottom of the Well MQ Lens of Truth Chest

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #Arrows (30 pieces)# and #the Song of Time#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #3# major items.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #Din's Fire#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that bombing the hole Volvagia last flew into can be rewarding.
